mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT AD JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = AD.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.DEPARTMENT_NO = #{departmentNo}

SELECT AD.NO NO, AD.MEMBER_NO MEMBER_NO, AD.CREATE_DATE CREATE_DATE, AD.TITLE TITLE, M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, AD.STATUS STATUS FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT AD JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = AD.MEMBER_NO JOIN APPROVER A ON M.NO = A.APPROVER_NO WHERE DEPARTMENT_NO = #{departmentNo} ORDER BY AD.NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE APPROVAL_DOCUMENT SET STATUS = 'R' WHERE NO = #{approvalDocumentNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPROVER ( NO, APPROVAL_DOCUMENT_NO, APPROVER_NO, APPROVAL_DATE, REASON, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_APPROVER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{approvalDocumentNo}, #{approverNo}, SYSDATE, #{reason}, 'R' )
